entries.text: StickerYou.com is your one-stop shop to make your business stick. You can create custom stickers, labels, decals, magnets, and more in any size, shape, and order quantity. If you’re printing your own custom stickers for your staff or to hand out at events, we have you covered. Start designing today with StickerYou’s world-leading sticker maker. Use code PERL10 at checkout for a 10% discount.
entries.title: Make your business stick with StickerYou.com’s world-leading sticker maker

chapters.header: A section for newbies and for people who need some refreshing of their Perl knowledge. If you have questions or suggestions about the articles, let me know and I'll try to make the necessary changes. The included articles are from the Perl Maven Tutorial and are part of the Perl Maven eBook.

entries.author: liztormato
entries.text: The BEGIN, END, CHECK, INIT blocks are called phasers that also exist in Perl 5. The ENTER, LEAVE, PRE, POST, KEEP, UNDO are different.

header: We still have two Perl events this year in Barcelona and in London, but we can already look ahead and see the events of next year in Pittsburgh and Riga. Have you already made preparations for the Workshop, conference, or hackathon you wish to run?
Let us know and enjoy the rest of your week!
subject: Barcelona - London - Pittsburgh - Riga
